
---
title: '首发 599 元，TP-LINK 推出真・全自动智能门锁 TL-SL31 Lite'
categories: 
 - 新媒体
 - IT 之家
 - 热榜
headimg: 'https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/8/968e4e9d-afcd-4663-a8d8-7a35860731ae.png'
author: IT 之家
comments: false
date: Thu, 04 Aug 2022 10:04:50 GMT
thumbnail: 'https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/8/968e4e9d-afcd-4663-a8d8-7a35860731ae.png'
---

<div>   
<p data-vmark="ccf0"><a class="s_tag" href="https://www.ithome.com/" target="_blank">IT之家</a> 8 月 4 日消息，据 TP- LINK 官方消息，TP-LINK 真・全自动智能门锁现已开启预售，首发 599 元。</p><p data-vmark="fed1">官方称，这可锁支持 5 大解锁方式、10 大安全措施、Wi-Fi 联网、App 远程查看门锁状态、0.369 秒指纹秒开，还有有独家设计的 15° 前倾面板。</p><p data-vmark="af68" style="text-align: center;"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/8/968e4e9d-afcd-4663-a8d8-7a35860731ae.png" w="1048" h="1038" title="首发 599 元，TP-LINK 推出真・全自动智能门锁 TL-SL31 Lite" width="1048" height="812" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><p data-vmark="d23c">据官方介绍，TP-LINK TL-SL31 Lite 智能门锁支持一握开锁，关门时实现自动反锁。官方称，它是一把真正的全自动门锁，搭配电子锁体，相较市面上的半自动和假全自动门锁而言，<strong>开门和关门都无需额外操作</strong>。</p><p data-vmark="bbf2">IT之家了解到，TP-LINKTL-SL31 Lite 智能门锁<strong>支持 Wi-Fi 直连技术</strong>，官方称将其续航时间优化到业内顶尖水平，只要有无线路由器，就可以联网，能实时了解开门动态。</p><p data-vmark="df85" style="text-align: center;"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/8/f4431ff3-8b07-4753-aab4-71fb09c3540d.jpg" w="580" h="16360" title="首发 599 元，TP-LINK 推出真・全自动智能门锁 TL-SL31 Lite" width="580" height="16360" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><dir><a contenteditable="false" href="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" target="_blank" data-wapurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-iosurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-androidurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-hosurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-uwpurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-wxmpurl="ithome://openmp?appid=wx91d27dbf599dff74&path=%2fpages%2funion%2fproxy%2fproxy%3fspreadUrl%3dhttps%253a%252f%252funion-click.jd.com%252fjdc%253fe%253d%2526p%253dJF8BAN8JK1olXgILUllYDEITAF8IGloUXwQBUVhaAUMnRzBQRQQlBENHFRxWFlVPRjtUBABAQlRcCEBdCUoWAW0LHl0SVA4dDRsBVXtOHWhPQiN9JmZGVyc_VgtpZAxqTCtlUQoyUV9VAE4QA2gLK1gXWgQEUFteD3t0ZAFVWAtwAFkHUW5dDXtVbS1DWgZOHzYCV19fDksQA2cAK1sSWQ4FVVhfAUwVAGs4G1MSbVpABh8fOHsnAF84K1slXjZcOl8OCEtHBWpfdQYSCUFXHBkFZksfCm0AGlodWDYAVV9fCnsn%26EA_PTAG%3d17078.27.380" data-jdid="100033247689"><span class="card main-site"><span class="card-logo"><img src="https://img14.360buyimg.com/pop/jfs/t1/159080/33/29223/420036/62ea4bd7E6b701665/35acaded5d9b3577.jpg" title="首发 级锁芯自带电子门铃 SL31 Lite</span></span><span class="card-abstract"></span><span class="card-controls"><span class="price">599 元</span><span class="card-btn-deep">直达链接</span></span></span></span></a></dir>

</div>
